languages.text: "Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, как жалко и глупо звучат твои угрозы, недолгое создание. Я — вечная загадка, ты — мимолетная искра, что уже затухает".
"You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, как жалко и глупо звучат твои угрозы, недолгое создание. Я — вечная загадка, ты — мимолетная искра, что уже затухает".

traits.locale_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

traits.locale_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: “转瞬即逝的生物啊，恐怕你无法想象你的威胁听起来有多么可悲，多么愚蠢。我是永恒不灭的谜团，而你不过是昙花一现的火花。消逝吧。”
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."

traits.locale_text: “转瞬即逝的生物啊，恐怕你无法想象你的威胁听起来有多么可悲，多么愚蠢。我是永恒不灭的谜团，而你不过是昙花一现的火花。消逝吧。”
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point vos menaces sont pitoyables et vaines, créature éphémère. Je suis un mystère éternel, et vous, vous n'êtes qu'une étincelle fugace. Disparaissez. »
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point vos menaces sont pitoyables et vaines, créature éphémère. Je suis un mystère éternel, et vous, vous n'êtes qu'une étincelle fugace. Disparaissez. »
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: 「惨めな生物らしく、なんて哀れで愚かな脅しだ。私は永遠の神秘であり、お前は儚い火花にすぎない。消えろ」
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."

traits.locale_text: 「惨めな生物らしく、なんて哀れで愚かな脅しだ。私は永遠の神秘であり、お前は儚い火花にすぎない。消えろ」
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: «No puedes imaginar lo patéticas y necias que son las amenazas de un ser efímero. Soy un misterio eterno y tú una chispa fugaz. Desaparece».
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."

traits.locale_text: «No puedes imaginar lo patéticas y necias que son las amenazas de un ser efímero. Soy un misterio eterno y tú una chispa fugaz. Desaparece».
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Ihr ahnt nicht, wie erbärmlich und töricht Eure Drohungen klingen, vergängliche Kreatur. Ich bin ein ewiges Mysterium, Ihr dagegen nur ein flüchtiger Funken. Verblasst."
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ahnt nicht, wie erbärmlich und töricht Eure Drohungen klingen, vergängliche Kreatur. Ich bin ein ewiges Mysterium, Ihr dagegen nur ein flüchtiger Funken. Verblasst."
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Tehditlerinin ne kadar acınası ve ahmakça olduğunu idrak etmen imkânsız fâni yaratık. Ben ebedî bir gizemim, sense gelip geçici bir kıvılcım. Sönüp gideceksin."
languages.original_text: "You cannot fathom how pathetic and foolish your threats sound, fleeting creature. I am an eternal mystery, while you are an evanescent spark. Fade away."
